sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>adds the sn_imt_core.approval_portal_manager role to any manager of the sys_user table.</description> <name>Add Approval Portal Manager roles</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[new ApprovalPortalUtil().addApprovalPortalManagerRoles(); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-03-18 21:39:46</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2506048609920110fa9b6a44ca319569</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Add Approval Portal Manager roles</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">fbd1bfe445b01010fa9b7ec6c81d77ce</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">fbd1bfe445b01010fa9b7ec6c81d77ce</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_2506048609920110fa9b6a44ca319569</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 00:02:06</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
